search.query: index="easm" sourcetype="easm:open_port" | stats count by port | sort - count | lookup port_to_service_lookup port | eval label=port." (".service.")"

index="easm" sourcetype="easm:open_port" port IN $portToken$ easm.hostname="$hostnameToken$" | dedup easm.entity, ip, port, easm.port_scan_type ``` | stats max(_time) as last_seen, min(_time) as first_seen, latest(hostname) as hostname, latest(easm.hostname) as easm_hostname by easm.entity, ip, port, easm.port_scan_type | eval _time = last_seen ``` | rename easm.hostname as easm_hostname | rename easm.* as * | eval ip = mvjoin(ip,",") | convert ctime(*seen) | lookup port_to_service_lookup port | table entity, ip, port, service, hostname, easm_hostname, port_scan_type | eval hostname=if(len(hostname)>500,replace(hostname,"^(.{500}).*","\1")."...",hostname) | rename hostname as "hostname (from discovery)", easm_hostname as "hostname (queried)", service as "service (likely)" | sort -_time
